name: Frogger (itch) (nicorm)
description:
Frogger

Welcome to my Frogger game. It is a visual recreation of the old Frogger game, with some tweaks due to time ;) 

It was made for an exam in approximately 7 to 10 days,  using c++ and raylib.

(Screenshots and gameplay are from version 1.0)

Hope you like it!

Controls 

Use the arrow keys to move!

Use ESC to pause the Game.

Credits

Game Development and Game Artist

Nicolas Ramos Marin
